anya-e1001n0:7: Āyubbedo manubbedo, gandhabbo ceti te tayo;
anya-e1001n0:10: Gandhabbā gaṇikā ceva, dhanubbedā ca pūraṇā.
anya-e1001n0:11: Tikicchā itihāso ca, jotimāyā ca chandati;
anya-e1001n0:12: Ketumantā ca saddā ca, sippāṭṭhārasakā ime.
anya-e1001n0:15: Daṇḍena nīyate cedaṁ, daṇḍaṁ nayati vā puna;
anya-e1001n0:24: (1) Paṇḍitakaṇḍa. (2) Sujanakaṇḍa. (3) Bāladujjana kaṇḍa. (4) Mittakaṇḍa. (5) Itthikaṇḍa. (6) Rājakaṇḍa. (7) Pakiṇṇaka kaṇḍa-
anya-e1001n0:26: Paṇḍito sujano kaṇḍo, dujjano mittaitthī ca;
anya-e1001n0:37: (1) Paṇḍitakathā. (2) Sambhedakathā. (3) Mittakathā. (4) Nāyaka kathā. (5) Itthikathā
anya-e1001n0:39: Muttaṁ muttaṁ sudassanaṁ, vande bodhivaraṁ varaṁ.
anya-e1001n0:40: Nītidha jantūnaṁ sāro, mittācariyā ca pitaro;
anya-e1001n0:43_1: dhanakathā (7) desakathā (8) nissayakathā (9) mittakathā (10) dujjanakathā (11) sujanakathā
anya-e1001n0:45: Brahmāti brahmabrahmindo, jino pūretu me bhāvaṁ.
anya-e1001n0:48: Vanditvā ratanaṁ seṭṭhaṁ, nissāya pubbake garu;
anya-e1001n0:51: Desañca nissayo mittaṁ, dujjano sujano balaṁ.
anya-e1001n0:52: Itthī putto ca dāso ca, gharāvāso katākato;
anya-e1001n0:56: Sīhā ekaṁ bakā ekaṁ, sikkhe cattāri kukkuṭā;
anya-e1001n0:57: Pañca kākā rājā nāma, cha sunakkhā tīṇi gadrabhā.
anya-e1001n0:59: Mahākammaṁ khuddakaṁ vā, yaṁ kammaṁ kātumicchati;
anya-e1001n0:60: Sabbārambhena kātabbaṁ, sīhā ekaṁ tadā bhave.
anya-e1001n0:66: Thiyā akkamma bhuttañca, sikkhe cattāri kukkuṭo.
anya-e1001n0:72: Daḷhabhatti ca sūrañca, cha etesvānato guṇo.
anya-e1001n0:74: Khinnova vahate bhāraṁ, sītuṇhañca na cintayī;
anya-e1001n0:75: Santuṭṭho ca bhave niccaṁ, tīṇi sikkheyya gadrabhā.
anya-e1001n0:77: Vīsati tāni guṇāni, careyya iha paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n0:78: Vijeyya ripū sabbepi, tejassī so bhavissati.
anya-e1001n0:79_1: (6) nāyakakaṇḍa (7) puttakaṇḍa (8) vejjācariyakaṇḍa (9) dāsakakaṇḍa (10) itthikaṇḍa (11) pakiṇṇakakaṇḍa
